sentences.sentence: Are consumers too deep in hock? A lot of observers think so.
sentences.translation: 消费者是否负债累累？许多观察家都这么认为。

sentences.sentence: Observers have reported serious violations of the ceasefire.
sentences.translation: 观察员报告说停火协议遭到严重破坏。

sentences.sentence: The new-found strength of local militancy appals many observers.
sentences.translation: 新发现的地方军事行动战斗力让很多观察员厌恶。
